description: Cameron Jackson lays out by the private pool and spies his adorable friend, Robbie Masters, already there taking in the rays. He falls off to sleep with the scent of Robbie's body wafting through the air.  When he wakes up, he finds that these thoughts have gotten the better of him, and his boner has crept up past his suit and the head is touching his navel. Robbie can't help butnotice that wonderful 9 inch banana and asks the question. Cam is happy let his fantasy come true, so off come the speedos and deep sucking ensues. Robbie is a pig for Cam's spoo and gobbles up every drop he can manage.
title: Triumvirate: Hey Dude.. Wanna Blow Job?, Scene #03
